EmailTemplate.subject: MBO Inquiry (1314893930.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi James,
My name is Nicolette Taylor and I am a part of the Direct Enrollment Team with MBO Partners. I received the inquiry you placed in our system last night and wanted to follow up with you to set up a time to speak so I am able to answer any questions you have about the MBO program and the services we provide.
I have attached a link to my time trade calendar below for you to select a convenient time for your schedule.
https://my.timedriver.com/9TGRK
I look forward to speaking with you soon!
Thank you for your interest in MBO Partners, have a great day.
Nicolette ___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Business Manager MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
